title: Does Pixel 3a support WiFi RTT (802.11mc) range measurements?
content:
Hi, I can't find any info on the subject, could someone clarify whether the phone supports WiFiRTT measurements or not? Are you able to install special app?
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.apps.location.rtt.wifirttscan
